subdisciplines.name: Agrammatism
subdisciplines.description: A language disorder characterized by difficulties in processing grammar and syntax.

subdisciplines.name: Aphasia
subdisciplines.description: A language disorder resulting from brain damage that affects a person's ability to use or comprehend language.

subdisciplines.name: Functional Neuroimaging
subdisciplines.description: The use of imaging techniques to study the neural basis of language processing.

subdisciplines.name: Language Acquisition
subdisciplines.description: The study of how humans acquire and learn language, both in childhood and later in life.

subdisciplines.name: Language Processing
subdisciplines.description: The study of the mental processes involved in the comprehension and production of language.
